text: Sam Querrey was the defending champion, but lost in the first round to Matthew Ebden. Juan Martín del Potro won the title, defeating Kevin Anderson in the final, 6–4, 6–4. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==Qualifying== ===Seeds=== ===Qualifiers=== ===Lucky Losers=== ===Qualifying draw=== ====First qualifier==== ====Second qualifier==== ====Third qualifier==== ====Fourth qualifier==== ==References== *Main draw *Qualifying draw Category:2018 Abierto Mexicano Telcel
